A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
All the cast seem to be siloed\, the fun of star was camaraderie was simply non existent. The obvious decisions to purposefully not fulfil anything the fans wanted hopefully has backfired. I watched this movie twice\, just because I could not believe what I was seeing. You want reasons and explanations\, expect none.
When Mark Hamill fundamentally disagrees with the storyline for his character is portrayed\, they should have listened.
Rose should not have been there\, Finn should have died a hero's death.
This was not a movie of the failure of the resistance\, it was the failure of how to make a Star Wars movie.
